item.title: Back to Hugo and on static site generators and custom themes
item.description: As you can see, this website is kinda different. I remade it, just because why not. I was previously using Hexo with a nice theme called cactus (properly altered to match my preference), but at some point I got tired of that as well. I wanted to create something simple and straight forward. This is the kind of website without too many bells and whistles. Just a blog, period. The initial idea of static site generators kinda goes well with this concept, but I don’t exactly know when or how things changed.
